job_history.work_description: Collect, enter and analyze stock prices, predict the future trend of different stocks, write summary report, customer service, design the questionnaire and get the feedback.

projects.description: The relationship between the mathematical grade of the seventh grade and grades from primary school.
Predict the lightening strikes in July based on the records from January to June.
Predict the daily stock price of Netflix Inc. Based on historical daily price records.
